message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I'm initially pricing it at $14,500. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $10,000. Would you consider lowering the price to $12,000?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is quite a bit lower than I can go.  Could you meet me halfway at $13,250?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $12,750 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle of our respective positions.
